member.name: T:SoundPull.Tools.SoundCloudPlayer
member.summary: Used to play tracks and playlists pulled from SoundPull using NAudio. It has play and pause functions, as well as a volume function. It can also retrieve the current position of your song (minutes:seconds) and the duration of your song (minutes:seconds)

member.name: M:SoundPull.Tools.SoundCloudPlayer.SetTrack(SoundPull.SoundCloud.SoundCloudTrack,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Set a new track for the player.

member.name: M:SoundPull.Tools.SoundCloudPlayer.SetPlaylist(SoundPull.SoundCloud.SoundCloudPlaylist,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Set a new playlist for the player.

member.name: M:SoundPull.Tools.SoundCloudPlayer.SetTrackInPlaylist(System.Int32)
member.summary: Change the track in the playlist if specified.

member.name: M:SoundPull.Tools.SoundCloudPlayer.SetLoop(SoundPull.Tools.SoundCloudPlayer.Loop)
member.summary: Set the loop type.

member.name: M:SoundPull.Tools.SoundCloudPlayer.Play
member.summary: Starts playing the track.

member.name: M:SoundPull.Tools.SoundCloudPlayer.Stop
member.summary: Stops the track.

member.name: M:SoundPull.Tools.SoundCloudPlayer.Pause
member.summary: Pauses the track.

member.name: M:SoundPull.Tools.SoundCloudPlayer.Next(System.Boolean)
member.summary: If a playlist is set, move to the next track.

member.name: M:SoundPull.Tools.SoundCloudPlayer.Previous(System.Boolean)
member.summary: If a playlist is set, go back to the previous track.

member.name: M:SoundPull.Tools.SoundCloudPlayer.SetVolume(System.Single)
member.summary: Set the volume.

member.name: M:SoundPull.Tools.SoundCloudPlayer.GetVolume
member.summary: Get the volume.

member.name: M:SoundPull.Tools.SoundCloudPlayer.GetPlayingTrack
member.summary: Get the current playing track.

member.summary: Get the current state of the player.

member.name: M:SoundPull.Tools.SoundCloudPlayer.GetCurrentPosition
member.summary: Gets the current position of the track and puts it in the format (m:ss)

member.name: M:SoundPull.Tools.SoundCloudPlayer.GetCurrentPosition(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the current position of the track and puts it in the format specified.

member.name: M:SoundPull.Tools.SoundCloudPlayer.GetLoop
member.summary: Gets the current loop type.
